name: huckleberry
description: The onboarding assistant that does your dirty work.
author: Danny Graham <good.midget@gmail.com>

scripts.ops:cluster:connect: gcloud container clusters get-credentials tools --zone us-central1-a --project gunio-tools
scripts.ops:gcloud:config: gcloud config set compute/zone us-central1-a; gcloud config set compute/region us-central; gcloud config set project gunio-tools
scripts.ops:gcloud:connect: gcloud config configurations activate gunio-tools && gcloud auth configure-docker
scripts.ops:gcloud:setup: gcloud config configurations create gunio-tools && gcloud auth login && npm run ops:gcloud:config
